<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Process many transfers to internal accounts (Bulk)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/transfer/internal/bulk"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method is called to send multiple instances of internal transfer to be processed by our infrastructure.
The maximum number of transfer slips that can be created in the same request is 25.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"title":"TransferRequest","required":["accountFrom","accountTo","amount","branchFrom","branchTo","clientRequestId"],"type":"object","properties":{"clientRequestId":{"description":"Unique identifier provided by the client. Can be used in response corelation.","type":"string"},"branchFrom":{"description":"Sender Bank Account Branch","maxLength":4,"type":"integer"},"accountFrom":{"description":"Sender account number","type":"integer"},"branchTo":{"description":"Receiver Bank Account Branch","maxLength":4,"type":"integer"},"accountTo":{"description":"Receiver account number","type":"integer"},"amount":{"description":"Amount in cents to be transfered. Example: 100 = R$1.00","type":"number"}}}},"examples":{"Example":{"value":[{"clientRequestId":"bb6fb4eb-f0f7-46d7-a2b3-eba424f6dca4","branchFrom":20,"accountFrom":340475,"branchTo":1,"accountTo":288761,"amount":50000}]}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}
